programme.title: Low Season
programme.desc: When her ability to see ghosts ruins her love life, a heartbroken woman seeks solace at a mountain resort, encountering several fellow, lonely singletons.

programme.title: Pee Nak 2
programme.desc: Three monks who had fulfilled their pledges & won their battle with the ghost of Nak are in for another challenge when they must fight the ghosts at the cursed temple who do not want them to escape alive.

programme.title: Matilahnak
programme.desc: Apabila penduduk Kampung Matilahnak tidak lagi takut pada hantu, Boss, selaku ketua hantu perlu mencari jalan supaya orang kampung kembali takutkan mereka.

programme.title: Bercakap Dengan Jin S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Tarmizi mengambil keputusan berjumpa dengan seorang kaunselor apabila dia sering diganggu dan melihat imej imej entiti dalam rakaman penggambaran sejak menerima manuskrip dari Mawar, seorang wanita misteri

programme.title: Hantu Judi
programme.desc: Jason seorang tahi judi menjumpai mayat wanita beserta wang tunai yang banyak di sisi mayat. Dia mengambil wang tersebut namun roh wanita tersebut mengekornya dan meminta bantuan untuk mencari pembunuhnya.

programme.title: Kubur
programme.desc: Since she received an antique watch from winning a game, Nurin senses an other-worldly presence in her house.

programme.title: Tokmoh Talent Agency
programme.desc: Seorang bomoh cuba mempelbagaikan sumber pendapatan dengan menyewakan hantu untuk digunakan sebagai pelakon tambahan dalam filem-filem seram.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: The movie follows five film students who are planning to shoot a movie at a haunted house. However, strange and creepy things begin happening to them there.

programme.title: Bercakap Dengan Jin S2 Ep04
programme.desc: Tarmizi mengambil keputusan berjumpa dengan seorang kaunselor apabila dia sering diganggu dan melihat imej imej entiti dalam rakaman penggambaran sejak menerima manuskrip dari Mawar, seorang wanita misteri

programme.title: Make Me Shudder
programme.desc: Kisah sekumpulan pelajar yang pergi ke sebuah bangunan tinggal di sekolah mereka untuk cabaran mencari hantu.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Hisyam Dan 3 Hantutiyer
programme.desc: 3 hantu cuba untuk membantu seorang lelaki amnesia selepas terlibat dalam sebuah kemalangan. Mereka dibantu oleh seorang bomoh bernama Pak Tam.

programme.title: Haunting Me
programme.desc: Four aging drag queens who run a boarding house for boys try all sorts of crazy schemes to get rid of the ghosts haunting their dormitory.

programme.title: Cara mengundang Hantu
programme.desc: Four unique stories about the many ways of conjuring ghosts.

programme.title: Office Uprising
programme.desc: The compound of an arms manufacturer turns into a zombie nightmare when workers are given a drink made using the wrong formula.

programme.title: Kudzu Zombies
programme.desc: When an agrochemical company tests its latest pesticide, the folks of a small town in the American South are turned into zombies. It is left to crop duster pilot Lonnie to lead the survivors to safety.

programme.title: Sumpah Ini Pocong
programme.desc: Comedy and horror collide in this Indonesian export about a scheming couple and their incompetent assistant, who will stop at nothing to achieve their political ambitions.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep202
programme.desc: Talking Tom decides to finally ask Talking Angela on a date, but his friends warn him he needs to find an extremely good way to do it.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep201
programme.desc: When Tom and his friends realize they are missing their memories, they try to figure out what is messing with their minds.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep213
programme.desc: Talking Tom and his friends get trapped in the diner during a storm, and start to go crazy as they become convinced a monster is coming for them.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep212
programme.desc: Talking Hank creates a new trendy food that becomes so popular the gang turns the garage into a restaurant.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep211
programme.desc: Talking Ben joins a club for geniuses, but his new friends and his old friends don't get along.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Ep210
programme.desc: Talking Tom throws a huge party for the entire town for his first act as mayor, but not everything goes according to plan.

programme.title: Pat the Dog Ep02
programme.desc: Hoodie falls into the sewers with Lola's precious scrapbook. Victor pretends he has the book and has Lola work in his garden to recover it. But Pat witnessed everything.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes Ep35
programme.desc: Tweety is tired of being overlooked because of his diminutive size.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic Ep906
programme.desc: Rainbow Dash's old pal Quibble Pants needs his friend's help to bond with the daughter of his new special somepony because, like Dash, she's a real sports pony. Unfortunately Quibble... isn't.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep83
programme.desc: After being 'bought' at a charity auction, Hawkodile is forced to spend the day as Old Lady Edith's personal bodyguard.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep52
programme.desc: When everyone on Bubbles' favorite show loses their happy, Bubbles helps bring it back.

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep10
programme.desc: Chester isn't acting like himself lately, but the trouble doesn't really start until Bunnicula realizes that his friend has been watching a possessed video cassette.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep23
programme.desc: The gang heads out to a Day of the Dead festival. There, they learn that the spirit of the old, legendary criminal, El Bandito, has returned to terrorise the locals.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? Ep28
programme.desc: The gang heads to Nashville, Tennessee to meet up with country music legend Kacey Musgraves!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show Ep57
programme.desc: Fed up with Tom's cat hair, Rick buys the Suck-Up, a robot vacuum cleaner with a mind of its own. When the Suck-Up turns on Tom and Jerry and takes over the house, the rivals team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep19
programme.desc: Daffy impersonates his favorite 70s detective show star.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings Ep19
programme.desc: When he realises that his beloved she-bear adores the smell of flowers Grizzy decides to offer her the geraniums that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin.

programme.title: Kingdom Force Ep120
programme.desc: It's a race against time after Envie Fernandez steals the Plains Kingdom's cherished night birds during the coming-of-cat ceremony.

programme.title: Kingdom Force Ep141
programme.desc: Big problems follow the team after a shrink ray zaps everything in sight...
